❌ **calling gh or git directly from a slash command** - Found in .claude/commands/erk/plan-save.md:128

✅ **using CLAUDE_SESSION_ID in hooks or Python code** - None found
✅ **modifying business logic in src/ without adding a test** - Not applicable (markdown-only change)

- `.claude/commands/erk/plan-save.md:128`: Direct git command usage (`git branch --show-current`) should be extracted to `erk exec` script with gateway abstraction
